CustomField.formula: TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(%%%NAMESPACED_ORG%%%Date_of_Arrival__c ))/365)) &' YEARS' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(%%%NAMESPACED_ORG%%%Date_of_Arrival__c)),365)/30)) &' MONTHS' & ' ' & TEXT(MOD(MOD((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(%%%NAMESPACED_ORG%%%Date_of_Arrival__c)),365),30)) &' DAYS'
CustomField.label: Calculated Time Known
